data.name: TurboMania Fog Racers
data.detailed_description:
BEAT YOUR OPPONENTS IN ARCADE STYLE


In these dynamic races you have to ram your opponents, avoid obstacles, drift and plan when to use your secret weapon - TURBO. See if you have good reflexes to win in a race in which 1 second decides whether you win or lose!

Avoid real-time simulated obstacles (as falling rocks, flying saucers, bulldozers etc.) calculated thanks to the advanced NVidia PhysX engine. Thanks to this, no race will be the same!

The best turbocharged cars and the craziest opponents are waiting to see if you can beat them. Cautious drivers should not report.

Furious and surprising power-ups - put your pedal to the metal as you race through stylized, varied levels. Collect POTATOES (the main in-game currency) to upgrade your vehicle or buy a better car ( feature available soon). Race in single player mode or in the local split screen ( split screen mode available soon).

There are as many as 10 cars with a unique driving style waiting for you. Try them in single race mode (1 map) or in free ride mode.

Ram your opponents' cars and watch them take to the skies - it's your job to win to become the Grand Master of TurboMania!

TurboMania Fog Racers combines old-school inspired gameplay (inspired by games like Igniton and MicroMachines) with 3D graphics.

Features


  • 1 single player free ride map with 10 available cars to choose from
  • 1 single player race map with 2 available cars to choose from ( more to come soon )
  • fast paced, addicting gameplay!
  • REAL TIME PhysX simulated obstacles
  • zero-violence gameplay
  • cool cars with unique looks, sounds and unique driving model

data.short_description: In these dynamic races you have to ram your opponents, avoid real-time simulated obstacles ( as falling rocks, flying saucers, bulldozers etc. ) , drift and plan when to use your secret weapon - TURBO. See if you're good enough to win in a race in which 1 second decides whether you win or lose!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64, Windows 8.1 x64, Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 / Intel Core i5 3470K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 660 2GB
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD type hard drive recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64, Windows 8.1 x64, Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4770k ( or better ) / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ( or better )
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050ti 4GB ( or better )
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD type hard drive recommended
